Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Firauni naboola mbu; “Munderere buli Omulosi Omumanyi muno.”
Ne olwabalosi betsa Musa nababoolela; “Sukune biamwenya okhusukuna”
Ne olwa basukuna, Musa naboola mbu; “Akamurerere kano ni obulosi, toto Nyasaye yetsa okhubufunaka. Toto Nyasaye shatinyisinjia ebikhole biabandu bokhunyasia tawe.”
“Ne Nyasaye yetsa okhwemia obulaamba khu makhuwa keke kata ababii nibalenyele.”
Ne shibasuubila khu Musa halali Abandu batiti okhurula khubandu be, nibarire Firauni nende Abandu baye okhubasandia. Toto Firauni yali omufuru khushialo, ne toto ye yali mubalia babura eshichelo
Musa naboola; “Enywe Abandu banje nimuli mbu musuubile Nyasaye, mumwisiche ye butswa, toto nimuli abelekhulanga khuye. (abasalamu)
Nibaboola mbu; “khwisichile Nyasaye, Ewe Nyasaye wefu Omulesi Olakhukhola khwanyoola obunyakhani okhurula khubandu ababii abo tawe
Ne khuhonokosie khulwetsimbabaasi tsitsio okhurulana nende Abandu Abakhayi.”

Mana nikhufimbulila Musa nende Omusiani wabu obufimbuli buno mbu:, “Bakasilie tsinzu Abandu benyu Misri ne mukhole tsinzu tsienyu okhuba habundu wokhukholela amalaamo , ne mulumilile okhulaama ( iswala), ne suubisia abasuubili.”

Musa naboola mbu; “Nyasaye wefu omulesi, toto ewe wahelesia Firauni nende abakhongo bebe ebirone nende omwandu khubulamu bwo khushialo buno, Khulwako bakoselinjiakhwo Abandu khunjila yiyio. Nyasaye wefu Omulesi, salania omwandu kwabu ne oboye emioyo chiabu, balasuubila tawe okhula balole eshinyasio eshilulu.”
